Segment.name: GRI
Segment.comment: To respond to a specific government reporting requirement

Field.name: ReportedDataIdCode
Field.comment: Code identifying specific government reporting requirements

Field.name: ReportedDataResponse
Field.comment: This element contains a condition or response

Field.name: QuantityQualifier
Field.comment: Code specifying the type of quantity

Field.name: DateTimeQualifier
Field.comment: Code specifying type of date or time, or both date and time

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: Description
Field.comment: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

SyntaxNote.name: R0204060810

SyntaxNote.name: C0506

SyntaxNote.name: C0708
